(let [suits #{:heart :diamond :spade :club},
        card? (fn [{:keys [suit rank]}]
                (boolean (and (suits suit)
                              (<= 0 rank 12))))]
    (fn trick-analyzer [trump]
      {:pre [(or (nil? trump) (suits trump))]}
      (fn winner
        ;; Single-argument signature accepts one sequence.
        ([[lead & more :as cards]]
         {:pre [(card? lead)]     ; Defer remaining checks via reduce.
          :post [(some #{%} cards)]}
         (reduce winner lead more))

        ;; Two-card comparison. This is what's called by `reduce`.
        ([{suit1 :suit, rank1 :rank :as card1}
          {suit2 :suit, rank2 :rank :as card2}]
         {:pre [(every? card? [card1 card2])]
          :post [ (some #{%} [card1 card2])]}
         (cond
           (= suit1 suit2)  {:suit suit1, :rank (max rank1 rank2)}
           (= suit2 trump)  card2
           :else            card1))

        ;; Variadic signature.
        ([card1 card2 & more]
         {:pre [(card? card1)]    ; Defer remaining checks via reduce.
          :post[(some #{%} (conj more card1 card2))]} 
         (reduce winner card1 (cons card2 more))))))

(fn wining-hand [trump-suit]
  (fn [hands]
    (let [first-suit (:suit (first hands))
          best-rank (fn [hand1 hand2]
                        (if (> (:rank hand1) (:rank hand2))
                          hand1
                          hand2))
          best-hand (fn [hand1 hand2]
                      (if (= (:suit hand1) (:suit hand2))
                             (best-rank hand1 hand2)
                             (if (= (:suit hand1) trump-suit)
                               hand1
                               (if (= (:suit hand2) trump-suit)
                                 hand2
                                 (if (= (:suit hand1) first-suit)
                                   hand1
                                   (if (= (:suit hand2) first-suit)
                                     hand2
                                     (best-rank hand1 hand2)))))))
          best-of-hands (fn [current-hand other-hands]
                          (if (empty? other-hands)
                            current-hand
                            (recur (best-hand current-hand (first other-hands))
                                           (rest other-hands))))]
      (best-of-hands (first hands) (rest hands)))))

(fn tcg
  [trump]
  (letfn [(reducer [hcard ncard]
            (if (or
                 (and
                  (= (:suit ncard) trump)
                  (not= (:suit hcard) trump))
                 (and
                  (= (:suit ncard) (:suit hcard))
                  (> (:rank ncard) (:rank hcard))))
              ncard
              hcard)
            )]
    (fn [[fcard & rtrick]] (reduce reducer fcard rtrick))))

(fn [trump]
  (fn [trick]
    (let [
      lead  (:suit (first trick))
      suit-val #(cond (= trump %) 0
                      (= lead %)  1
                      :else       2)
      suit-cmp #(compare (suit-val %1) (suit-val %2))
      rank-cmp #(- (compare %1 %2))
      cmp (fn [{asuit :suit, arank :rank},
               {bsuit :suit, brank :rank}]
        (let [suit-order (suit-cmp asuit bsuit)]
          (if (zero? suit-order)
            (rank-cmp arank brank)
            suit-order)))
    ] (first (sort cmp trick)))))

      (let [suit-value (assoc {trump-suit 0} lead-suit -1)
            by-suit-and-rank (fn [{asuit :suit, arank :rank},
                                  {bsuit :suit, brank :rank}]
                               (compare [(suit-value asuit) arank]
                                        [(suit-value bsuit) brank]))]
        (last (sort by-suit-and-rank cards)))))

(fn [trump]

(fn best [trump]
    (fn [col]
        (reduce
            (fn best [f s]
                (if (= (f :suit ) (s :suit ))
                    (last (sort-by :rank [f s]))
                    (if (= trump (s :suit ))
                        s
                        f)))
            col)))

(fn cards-evaluate [trump]
  (fn [cards]
    (reduce
     (fn [{suit1 :suit rank1 :rank :as card1} {suit2 :suit rank2 :rank :as card2}]
       (if (not= suit2 suit1)
         (if (= suit2 trump)
           card2
           card1)
         (if (> rank1 rank2)
           card1
           card2)))
     cards)))

(fn [trump]
  (fn [trick]
    (let [lead
          (first trick)
          calc-score
          (fn [play]
            (let [multiplier
                  (cond 
                    (= (play :suit) (lead :suit)) 1
                    (= (play :suit) trump) 2
                    :else 0)]
              (* multiplier (play :rank))))]
      (reduce
       (fn [winner-so-far item]
         (if (> (calc-score item) (calc-score winner-so-far))
                item winner-so-far))
       lead
       (rest trick)))))

(fn make-winner [i]
  (cond 
    (nil? i)
    (fn win-from-rank [c]
      (loop [c1 (rest c), win (first c)]
        (if (empty? c1)
          win
          (let [f (first c1)]
            (cond
              (and (= (win :suit) (f :suit)) (> (f :rank) (win :rank))) 		(recur (rest c1) f) 
              (and (= (win :suit) (f :suit)) (not (> (f :rank) (win :rank)))) 	(recur (rest c1) win) 
              (and (not= (win :suit) (f :suit))) 								(recur (rest c1) win)
              )))))
    
    (or (= i :spade) (= i :club) (= i :heart) (= i :diamond))
    (fn win-from-suit [c]
      (loop [c1 c, win nil]
        (if (empty? c1)
          win
          (let [f (first c1)]
            (cond
              (and (= nil win)    (= i (f :suit)))    							      (recur (rest c1) f)
              (and (= nil win)    (not= i (f :suit)))								  (recur (rest c1) win)
              (and (not= nil win) (= i (f :suit))    (> (f :rank) (win :rank)))       (recur (rest c1) f)
              (and (not= nil win) (= i (f :suit))    (not (> (f :rank) (win :rank)))) (recur (rest c1) win)
              (and (not= nil win) (not= i (f :suit)))							      (recur (rest c1) win)
              )))))
    
    (map? i)
    (fn win-from-map [c]
      (let [{suit :suit, rank :rank} i]
        (loop [c1 c, win nil]
          (if (empty? c1)
            win
            (let [f (first c1)]
              (cond
                (and (= nil win)    (= suit (f :suit)))    							(recur (rest c1) f)
                (and (= nil win)    (not= suit (f :suit))) 							(recur (rest c1) win) 
                (and (not= nil win) (= suit (f :suit))     (= (f :rank) rank)) 		(recur (rest c1) f)
                (and (not= nil win) (= suit (f :suit))     (not= (f :rank) rank)) 	(recur (rest c1) win)
                (and (not= nil win) (not= suit (f :suit)))							(recur (rest c1) win))
              )))))
    ))

(fn [suit]
  (:pre [(contains? #{:spade :heart :diamond :club nil} suit)])
  (fn winner [cards-vec]
    (let [suits #{:spade :heart :diamond :club}
          ranks {2 1 3 2 4 3 5 4 6 5 7 6 8 7
                 9 8 10 9 "J" 10 "Q" 11 "K" 12 "A" 13}
          trump-suit (if (contains? suits suit) suit :notrump)
          first-card-led-suit (:suit (first cards-vec))
          comp-card (fn [x y]
                      (cond
                        (= (:suit x) (:suit y))
                          (compare
                            (ranks (:rank x))
                            (ranks (:rank y)))
                        (and
                          (= trump-suit :notrump)
                          (= first-card-led-suit (:suit x))) 1
                        (and
                          (= trump-suit :notrump)
                          (= first-card-led-suit (:suit y))) -1
                        (= trump-suit (:suit x)) 1
                        (= trump-suit (:suit y)) -1
                        :else 0))]
      (first (reverse (sort comp-card cards-vec))))))

(fn tricky-card-game [trump]
  (fn [cards]
    (let [groups        (group-by :suit cards)
          power-suit    (reduce (fn [res [k v]]
                                  (assoc res
                                    k
                                    (first (sort-by :rank
                                                    #(compare %2 %1)
                                                    v))))
                                {}
                                groups)
          reduced-cards (:res (reduce (fn [{:keys [added-set res]} {:keys [suit]}]
                                        (if (contains? added-set suit)
                                          {:added-set added-set
                                           :res       res}
                                          {:added-set (conj added-set suit)
                                           :res       (conj res (get power-suit suit))}))
                                      {:added-set #{}
                                       :res       []}
                                      cards))]
      (reduce (fn [max-card card]
                (if (= trump (:suit card))
                  card
                  max-card))
              (first reduced-cards)
              (drop 1 reduced-cards)))))

(fn n141 [suit]
  (letfn [(n141-t [suit cards]
                  (let [suit (if (nil? suit) (:suit (first cards)) suit)
                        sorted-cards (reverse (sort-by :rank cards))
                        same-suit (filter #(= suit (:suit %)) sorted-cards)
                        other-suit (filter #(not= suit (:suit %)) sorted-cards)]
                    (if (empty? same-suit)
                      (first other-suit)
                      (first same-suit))))]
    (partial n141-t suit)))

(fn trick-winner
  [trump]
  (let [take-all (fn take-all
                   [lom suit]
                   (filter #(= suit (% :suit)) lom))
        highest-card (fn [lom] (last (sort-by #(% :rank) lom)))]
    (cond
      (nil? trump) (fn [alistomap]
                     (highest-card (take-all alistomap ((first alistomap) :suit))))

(fn [trump]
  (fn [[c & cs]]
    (let [score (fn [[{suit :suit rank :rank :as card} & cs]
                     {w-suit :suit w-rank :rank :as winner}]
                  (cond (nil? card)
                        winner

                        (and (= suit w-suit) (> rank w-rank))
                        (recur cs card)
                          
                        (and (= suit trump) (not= w-suit trump))
                        (recur cs card)

                        :else
                        (recur cs winner)))]
      (score cs c))))

(fn f [trump]
  (fn [hands]
    (let [led (first hands)
          led-suit (:suit led)
          possibles (filter #(let [s (:suit %)] ((set [led-suit trump]) s)) hands)
          is-trump (fn [hand] (= trump (:suit hand)))]
      (reduce
        (fn [hand1 hand2]
          (cond
            (and (is-trump hand1) (not (is-trump hand2))) hand1
            (and (is-trump hand2) (not (is-trump hand1))) hand2
            (> (:rank hand1) (:rank hand2)) hand1
            :else hand2))
        possibles))))

(letfn
  [(f [trump [c & cs]]
     (let [t (if (nil? trump) (:suit c) trump)]
       (if (empty? cs) c
         (let [best (f t cs)]
           (if (not= (:suit best) t) c
             (if (not= (:suit c) t) best
               (if (> (:rank best) (:rank c)) best c)))))))]

  (fn func [trump] (partial f trump)))

; Reduce is the strategy, 
; 1. We use the initial value as {:suit suit-arg} if there is a non nil suit argument.
; 2. If there is no suit then the (first arg) is the init value. {:suit .. :rank ..}
; We filter all the key value pairs of (args) for the suit-arg and reduce it using max over :rank

;Ah and as an optimization we can generate a transducer from the filter function so that it is more efficient :)
; Ok I can't use transducers in this version of clojure but its commented below

(fn [suit-arg]

    (fn [plays]
    ; filter function
    (letfn [
            (init-fn []
              (if suit-arg
                suit-arg
                (:suit (first plays)))
            )
            (filter-fn [play]
            	(let [{:keys [suit]} play]
                   (= suit (init-fn))
             	)
             )
            (reduce-fn 
              [init play] 
              (let [{:keys [suit rank]} play]
                 (assoc init 
                        :rank (max rank (get init :rank -1))
                        :suit suit)
                 )
              
              )

    (fn [cards]
      (let [led (:suit (first cards))]
        (first (sort-by :rank > (filter #(= (:suit %) led) cards)))))
  (fn [cards]
    (let [suited (filter #(= trump (:suit %)) cards)]
      (if (empty? suited)
        (first (sort-by :rank > cards))
        (first (sort-by :rank > suited)))))))

(fn card-games [trump]
  (fn [[start & cards]]
    (let [get-highest (fn [suit]
                        (->> cards
                             (cons start)
                             (filter #(= suit (:suit %)))
                             (sort-by :rank)
                             reverse
                             first))
          highest-trump (get-highest trump)
          highest-suit (get-highest (:suit start))]
      (or highest-trump highest-suit))))

(fn [trumpsuit]
  (fn [cards]
    (let [leadingsuit (:suit (first cards))
          basic-ranks {:spade 4 :heart 3 :club 2 :diamond 1}
          suit-ranks  (assoc (if trumpsuit
                               (assoc basic-ranks trumpsuit 6)
                                basic-ranks) leadingsuit 5)
          compare-fn  (fn [a b]
                        (let [suit-a (:suit a)
                              suit-b (:suit b)]
                          (if (= suit-a suit-b)
                            (> (:rank a) (:rank b))
                            (> (suit-a suit-ranks) (suit-b suit-ranks)))))]
      (first (sort compare-fn cards)))))

(fn trick [trump]
  (fn [cards]
    (let [suit #(:suit %)
          bridge (fn [that this]
                   (if (= (:suit this) (:suit that))
                      (if (> (:rank this) (:rank that)) this that)
                      (if (= (:suit this) trump) this that)))]
      (reduce bridge cards))))

(fn [trump]
    (fn winner [cards]
      (let [lead-suit (:suit (first cards))
            
            ]
        (reduce (fn [{h-suit :suit h-rank :rank :as highest}
                     {c-suit :suit c-rank :rank :as current}]
                  (cond
                   (and (not= h-suit c-suit)
                        (= c-suit trump))
                   current
                   
                   (= h-suit c-suit)
                   (if (< h-rank c-rank)
                     current
                     highest)
                   
                   :else
                   highest))
                
                cards))))

(fn trick-win [trump]
  (fn [cards]
    (let [led (first cards)
          suit-order0 [:spade :heart :diamond :club]
          suit-order1 (cons led (remove #(= led %) suit-order0))
          suit-order-final (if-not (nil? trump)
                             (cons trump (remove #(= trump %) suit-order1))
                             suit-order1)
          suit-cmp
          (fn suit-cmp [l r]
            (if (= l r) 0
                (if (= l (some #{l r} suit-order-final))
                  -1 1)))
          hand-cmp
          (fn hand-cmp [{lsuit :suit lrank :rank}
                        {rsuit :suit rrank :rank}]
            (if (= lsuit rsuit) (- (compare lrank rrank))
                (suit-cmp lsuit rsuit)))]
    (first (sort hand-cmp cards)))))

        (and

(fn winner [suit]
  (fn [cards]
    (let [ref (atom {:suit suit
                     :winner nil})
          [f & r] cards
          larger? (fn [card1 winner suit]
                    (cond
                      (and (= (:suit card1) (:suit winner)) (> (:rank card1) (:rank winner))) true
                      (and (not= (:suit card1) (:suit winner)) (= (:suit card1) suit)) true
                      :else false))]
      (if suit
        (swap! ref assoc-in [:suit] suit)
        (swap! ref assoc-in [:suit] (:suit f)))
      (swap! ref assoc-in [:winner] f)
      (doseq [card r]
        (when (larger? card (get @ref :winner) (:suit @ref))
          (swap! ref assoc-in [:winner] card)))
      (:winner @ref))))
